pullRequest.title: ENT-2455: Fix too many params for Entitlements query
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes I needed to prevent "too many parameters" error while testing with a large DB dump.
Note: I am not sure how to deal with paging. With partitioned parameters we will be loading a lot of unnecessary data.

nodes.bodyText:
If we're going to be using this lookup for paging, we need the query itself to be ordered, and we cannot use a set (as its ordering is not guaranteed either).
The entire criteria usage itself likely needs to be axed here.

nodes.bodyText: If we're requiring a list as input, we could use .sublist instead of streaming and collecting.

We're still broken here (and, for the record, we were broken before): as soon as we re-query here, we lose any sorting from the pageRequest unless we pass the same sorting params through.
Additionally, if we're going to keep the multi-query behavior, we should use this as an opportunity to not query the entire set of entitlements, and only grab the entitlements from the block of IDs we're going to fetch.
